text: 44 (forty-four) is a number. It comes between forty-three and forty-five, and is an even number. It is divisible by 1, 2, 4, 11, 22 and itself, 44. ==Science== ===Chemistry=== * Forty-four is the atomic number of ruthenium. ===Astronomy=== * The saros number of the solar eclipse series which began on April 30, 1448 BC and ended on June 7, 168 BC. Category:Integers
title: 44 (number)
